en-US.summary: Test your knowledge of Hertha football club and Hertha players.
en-US.name: Hertha Club
en-US.description:
Test your knowledge of Hertha football club and Hertha players.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Hertha Club" or "Alexa, open Hertha Club" to start the game".

At anytime, you can stop the game by saying "Alexa, stop"
